title: Isle o' Hags
description: The expansive hub world for Banjo-Tooie.

general.name: Klungo 1
general.description: How to fight all three variants of Klungo 1.

general.name: Klungo 2
general.description: How to fight all three variants of Klungo 2.

general.name: Klungo 3
general.description: How to fight all three variants of Klungo 3.

general.name: Fire Switch Shot w/o Egg Aim
general.description: Using the mound next to the fire switch in Plateau, the fire switch can be hit without learning egg aim.

general.name: Plateau Early
general.description: A precise beak bust can give you just enough height to reach the entrance to Plateau without learning grip grab.

general.name: GGM Early (Any%)
general.description: GGM can be entered before completing Jiggywiggy's puzzle via a precise beak bust between the wooden frame and the grate that blocks the level off. This is the Any% setup.

general.name: GGM Early (100%)
general.description: GGM can be entered before completing Jiggywiggy's puzzle via a precise beak bust between the wooden frame and the grate that blocks the level off. This is the 100% setup.

cwkshots.name: Cliff Top Jinjo Shot
cwkshots.description: The jinjo in the Cliff Top alcove can be reached without claw clamber boots by shooting a clockwork from the correct position.

cwkwarps.name: HAKDIAATSTBHHHMMW (PTS)
cwkwarps.description: With a well-timed grenade poop and clockwork shot, Banjo can warp to the clockwork's position by taking damage at the same time the clockwork breaks free from the egg. It can be used to reach areas such as the pipe in Quagmire without the shock spring pad.
